sn22.155:4.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa sakkāyadiṭṭhi uppajjatī”ti?
sn22.155:4.4: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa sakkāyadiṭṭhi uppajjati.
sn22.155:4.8: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ upādāya, viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa sakkāyadiṭṭhi uppajjati.
sn22.155:4.9: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.155:4.12: api nu taṃ anupādāya sakkāyadiṭṭhi uppajjeyyā”ti?
sn22.155:4.20: api nu taṃ anupādāya sakkāyadiṭṭhi uppajjeyyā”ti?
